solution_line_template: Eustace's current age must be {eustace_future_age} years old - {years_in_future} years = <<{eustace_future_age}-{years_in_future}={eustace_current_age}>>{eustace_current_age} years old.
So Milford's current age must be {eustace_current_age} years old / {age_ratio} = <<{eustace_current_age}/{age_ratio}={milford_current_age}>>{milford_current_age} years old.
So in 3 years, Milford will be {milford_current_age} years old + {years_in_future} years = <<{milford_current_age}+{years_in_future}={milford_future_age}>>{milford_future_age} years old.
